column5: This is a video taken not far from where I live. The vid is in French but you'll be able to see how the ice fishing is here and get a hint as to their rigging. The dude with the light green hoodie is Luc Couture, my main contact at Thomas marine.....buying a boat/motor from someone this good at fishing is a pleasure.  Enjoy.  http://www.pecheenligne.net/videos/PEL_201001.wmv  edited to add: This is on the St. Lawrence.

Thanks Roy for posting this awesome video I love when Luc said "le téléphone sonne...  y sonne encore"  WOW what a great fisherie and some big eyes too Very informative in their choice of tackle.... light line, small hooks and big minnows sometime small, structure.  Question:  Is this where you caught the big eye this past summer?  Jacques
dang...can't open it from here at work...c'est dommage.  I'll have to check it out at home.
Thanks Jacques and no, I'm usually 2-3 miles west of there.  Yeah, the telephone comment is perfect. I'd never heard it before.
Right click and "Save Target As" in IE or "Save Link as" in Firefox. Then save where you want. Open when complete.
I need sub titles, grade nine french doesn't cut it. I think yous guys are just trying to lure this anglo onto punky ice.  Nice Doré!
Don't feel bad Rob.. my Maclean and Maclean french dictionary doesn't help me at all !!
I have met Martin Berube a few times, super nice guy
Yes Ron, Martin is a good dude and also the groups musky attractor.
